thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Castlight Health Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.06

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Castlight Health Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.06
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Castlight Health Inc:
* CASTLIGHT HEALTH ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.04
* Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.06 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 29 PERCENT TO $131.4 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $150 MILLION TO $155 MILLION * FOR FULL YEAR 2018, COMPANY EXPECTS NON-GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE OF APPROXIMATELY $0.11 TO $0.15
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.05, REVENUE VIEW $36.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.09, REVENUE VIEW $160.5 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
